headline: The Bull Case For Genuine Parts (GPC) Could Change Following Leadership Shift And Tight Dividend Coverage
summary: Genuine Parts Company recently announced that Non-Executive Chairman Paul D. Donahue will retire at the 2026 annual meeting, with current President and CEO Will Stengel set to assume the combined role of Chairman and Chief Executive Officer at that time. This planned consolidation of leadership comes as the company faces increased scrutiny over its long-running dividend program, with payouts now consuming nearly all annual net income against a backdrop of higher debt and reduced cash...

headline: Evaluating Genuine Parts (GPC) Valuation As Rising Debt And Rich Dividends Test Its Dividend King Status
summary: Leadership change puts Genuine Parts dividend profile in focus Genuine Parts (GPC) is drawing attention after a review of its dividend policy highlighted a payout close to 100% of annual net income, along with shrinking free cash flow and higher leverage. See our latest analysis for Genuine Parts.
